A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Compared to the original trilogy\, a disaster. Too preachy (weapons manufacturers are greedy capitalists)\, too Disney (Princess Leia does a Mary Poppins to return to the ship)\, and too fatalistic (Luke gives up and tunes out the Force).  Lacks the cheeky and youthful spirit of Star Wars\, the Taoistic mysticism of the Empire Strikes Back\, and the redemptive conclusion of Return of the Jedi. Compared to the prequels and Disney's other installments\, it was a triumph.  Time to face it fans -- we will never catch lightening in a bottle again.
